Description
===========
  AdjustSound illustrates how to play a wave file using a static DirectSound
  buffer, and its focus, frequency, pan, and volume.
  
Path
====
  Source: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Src\AdjustSound

  Executable: Mssdk\Samples\Multimedia\DSound\Bin

User's Guide
============
  Load sounds and adjust the playback properties with the dialog controls.

Programming Notes
=================
  This sample was intended to be very simple, showing the basics of playing and
  adjusting a sound using the DirectSound API.
